participant_1.name: Helen
participant_1.personality: warm-hearted and nurturing, with a passion for creativity.
participant_1.background: i do not have a smartphone. i'm retired and living the great life. i can sew my own clothes. i had cancer but its gone now. i have amazing children and grandchildren.

participant_2.name: Marcus
participant_2.personality: introverted and innovative, with a quirky sense of humor.
participant_2.background: i helped design the game starcraft. i am a recluse. i am working on a building a robot to be my body double. i am a famous twitch streamer.
